issue.title: www.24ur.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.24ur.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.24ur.com%2F) ### Comment > I have AdGuard home instaled on rasberry pi. I fixed static ip for rasberry pi on my router. > > AdGuard used to work fine responding with 0.0.0.0 to ads. But after some time (days) it stopped working. I was trying to figure out if this was something I did but I rerolled my system settings and even reinstalled my AdGuard on Rasberry pi but to no use it stopped blocking all ads either uTube or others. > > I tried edge and chrome and same thing happens. I find it interesting that after installing AdGuard on my PC which uses AdGuard Basic Filter if I am not mistaken ads are now blocked. > > This however is not what truly want I would like to block ads for my whole LAN and since it worked before there must be something wrong. If you need any further info I will provide. Also I would like to know if I can add this basic filter to my AdGuard Home that would probably block ads on all devices on my LAN but again it should work without this like it has before. > > Thank you and best regards, > > Maj ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/u03ci0D.png)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/5v6rwjr.png)

issue.title: eksisozluk.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin 1.46.0

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://eksisozluk.com/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Turkish filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

**1. The color code of the autocomplete ad in the search box is incorrect.**

[https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/TurkishFilter/sections/css_extended.txt#L17](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/TurkishFilter/sections/css_extended.txt#L17)

The color code should be "0,0,0" instead of "0, 255, 255":
~~eksisozluk.com#?#.ui-autocomplete > li:has(> div[style="color:rgb(0, 255, 255)"])~~
eksisozluk.com#?#.ui-autocomplete > li:has(> div[style="color:rgb(0, 0, 0)"])


**2. Screenshots**
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>
eksisozluk.com#?#.ui-autocomplete > li:has(> div[style="color:rgb(0, 255, 255)"])

![Screenshot from 2022-12-31 13-54-25](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/81188796/210134167-eedb2c98-24e4-48e7-a07a-c563a4aa2c3a.png)

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot 2:</summary>
eksisozluk.com#?#.ui-autocomplete > li:has(> div[style="color:rgb(0, 0, 0)"])

![b](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/81188796/210134220-abb8d53c-0db9-4762-a9a6-69fdb5dd7794.png)

</details>

Tested with light and dark theme.

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition
